item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: Pectra is going live ü•≥
Holesky will fork at slot 3710976 (Mon, Feb 24 at 21:55:12 UTC) Sepolia will fork at slot 7118848 (Wed, Mar 5 at 07:29:36 UTC)
Assuming Sepolia goes smoothly, we'll pick the mainnet slot on the March 6 ACD call üìÖ
item.dc:creator: @TimBeiko
item.description:
Pectra is going live ü•≥

Holesky will fork at slot 3710976 (Mon, Feb 24 at 21:55:12 UTC)
Sepolia will fork at slot 7118848 (Wed, Mar 5 at 07:29:36 UTC)

Assuming Sepolia goes smoothly, we'll pick the mainnet slot on the March 6 ACD call üìÖ

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: How Things Work #0: ZODA and the Accidental Computer
Today, we explore how Data Availability Sampling (DAS) can scale blockchains with @alexhevans and @GuilleAngeris from @BainCapCrypto.
Turns out, you can (somehow) embed verifiable computations over data in DA into DA ü™Ñ.
item.dc:creator: @commonwarexyz
item.description:
How Things Work #0: ZODA and the Accidental Computer

Today, we explore how Data Availability Sampling (DAS) can scale blockchains with @alexhevans and @GuilleAngeris from @BainCapCrypto.

Turns out, you can (somehow) embed verifiable computations over data in DA into DA ü™Ñ.

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: 2025 prediction: Rollups will embrace ZK and unlock interoperability across Ethereum and its L2s.
ZK has never been easier to implement with tools like @SuccinctLabs OP-Succinct and @RISCZero Kailua.
This is Ethereum‚Äôs secret weapon against the ‚ÄúEthereum killers.‚Äù

item.title:
RT by @emilianobonassi: üö® We have cut the Foundry v1.0 Release Candidate, and published a migration guide. üö®
Run `foundryup -i rc` to get the RC binaries and try it out.
It is important to us we get your feedback as this is the last step before the official 1.0 release after three years.
Docs link in thread below.
item.dc:creator: @gakonst
item.description:
üö® We have cut the Foundry v1.0 Release Candidate, and published a migration guide. üö®

Run `foundryup -i rc` to get the RC binaries and try it out.

It is important to us we get your feedback as this is the last step before the official 1.0 release after three years.

Docs link in thread below.
